title: New: The XX – Chained
content: The most overhyped band of 2012 The XX announced their return last month with the beautifully understated new track Angels, and now the recently Pitchfork premiered Chained picks up where the aforementioned song left off. Ever so slightly more upbeat, and mixing the male / female vocals, Chained isn’t too far from the sound of their self-titled debut LP, and again relies upon the indescribably perfect production, that’s utterly flawless throughout. Whilst the number of ‘non-articles’ that The XX provoke (e.g. ‘Here’s six seconds of The XX blowing their noses live’), can be disarmingly frustrating, there’s no doubting that Coexist is one of the most hotly anticipated releases of 2012.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
